description: Warm up with this slow cooker beef and mushroom casserole. Comforting, delicious and topped with potato minis, it'll be an instant family favourite.
name: Beef & Mushroom Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook potato minis as per packet instructions. Stir chopped parsley through the casserole. Serve with potatoes and garnish with fried parsley.
